participant_1.name: Jason
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and optimistic, enjoys sharing experiences and connecting with others.
participant_1.background: I hit for over forty million dollars. One day I played the lottery. I will never punch a clock again. I used to work a 9 to 5 job as a telemarketer.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and sociable, loves to shop and enjoys music, especially pop.
participant_2.background: I drink diet coke. I spend too much time shopping. I drive a ford taurus. I love Katy Perry.

content.text: I don't have to work anymore because I won the lottery!
Congratulations! What did you do to celebrate?
I bought a new house, a new car, and I took a trip to the Bahamas.
That sounds amazing! I'm so happy for you.
Thanks! I'm still getting used to it all.
I can imagine. So, what do you do for fun now?
I spend a lot of time shopping. I love going to the mall and buying new clothes.
That's great! I love shopping too.
I also love listening to Katy Perry. She's my favorite singer.
I'm so glad we met. We have so much in common.
Me too! I'm so happy to have met you.
I'm excited to get to know you better.
Me too! I think we're going to be great friends.
